metadata.title: CVE-2020-24361 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description:
SNMPTT before 1.4.2 allows attackers to execute shell code via EXEC, PREXEC, or unknown_trap_exec.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2020-24361` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

snmptt - 1.4.2-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: snmptt package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.4.2-1').
